title: Spiral: From the Book of SAW Trailer Discussion | Reel Talk Podcast
author: Reel Talk
comment: I seriously hope the bathroom does return in this film because it would be awesome to see if that's the case Marcus banks was involved in from the og jigsaw case, either way I'd like to see an investigation going on in the bathroom and either finally finding Hoffman

I’m like 99.9 percent sure that the voice is a text to speech voice, we can see that this killer is very careful about his or hers work (using wood for the play me tape and the text to speech voice). But I think that this killer is someone completely different that we probably don’t know about
Chris Rock is amazing in Fargo
If they don’t show the bathroom in this one hopefully in SAW 10 or Spiral 2
I can't believe this is out in like a week lol
description:
Today, we are talking about the latest Spiral trailer (I know this is a bit late), but we also sprinkle in a bit of sequel speculation and theories about the movies. Let's discuss!
